body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Perez Automotive Customer Support. My name is Alan Perez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kayla. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have been overall happy with my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Can I please have your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's seven eight two zero, five six one, three four two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And may I have your email address as well?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kayla, I have noted down your contact information. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kayla. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
